name: FAKE'S-COM
description:
FAKE'S-COM is an X-COM like game with a twist: Your friend's birthday gifts have been stolen, which made him sunburnt, and you must retrieve them and face the evil CyberDuck.

This game runs on the TIC-80 Fantasy Console. It is needed to view the source code.

All the assets are custom made for the game, and you are allowed to use them in other games.

Controls:

Mouse - move, shoot

Z - end turn prematurely, continue

X - show controls
